body:
A.  DEPT 05 CLEAN FOR PLATE @ 4 MIN. A-2 (HOT ACID)      CODE: 3R10V4A2 06/22/07
    1 LOAD @ 175.0 #/LOAD
                                                                        12/15/17
                                                                    (MAX: 228.0)
    MACHINE PARAMETERS:
    1. UP BARREL ROTATION: OFF
    2. BBL RPM:  3-4 RPM (DEPENDING ON STATION)
    3. CLEANER VOLTAGE:  10 VOLTS

    4. ACID:  4 MIN. A-2 (HOT ACID)

B.  DEPT 05 TIN-ZINC PLATE & CLEAR TRIVALENT CHROMATE       CODE: SOLFL 04/06/18
    1 LOAD @ 175.0 #/LOAD 285 AMPS FOR 136 MIN @ 5 RPM W/ 15.0 VOLT LIMIT
                                                                        12/15/17
                                                   (MAX: 228.0 372 136 1.7 3.00)
    ***** CHECK THICKNESS ON 1ST LOAD BEFORE PULLING *****

    TURN DOWN:
    1. 25% OF S.O. AMPS
    2. 15 MIN.

    POST DIP:
    1. TZ CHROMATE = SEE STANDARD PAUSE @ 6 RPM

    DRYING:
    1. TEMP = 155
    2. SPEED = 60 HZ

    INSPECTION GUIDELINES:
    APPEAR: 1. PARTS MUST HAVE TOTAL PLATING COVERAGE
            2. PARTS SHOULD BE FREE OF PARTICULATE MATTER (PAST PROBLEM W/TZ)
               CHECK RECESSED AREAS, ID AREAS, AND THREADS CLOSELY
            3. CHECK FOR BARREL SPOTS - SHOULD NOT SEE ANY.  MAY SEE A FEW,
               MUST BE FAINT AND SPORADIC.
    ADHES:  1. PARTS SHOULD HAVE EXCELLENT ADHESION - NO BLISTERS
    THICK:  1. CHECK 5 PCS ON 1ST LOAD OF EACH WAVE @ LOCATION LISTED BELOW
            2. DIR:  LINCOLN      PRODUCT:  TZ/FE
            3. TARGET MEAN (MILS) = .275 - .325
            4. TIN % MUST BE 60-85%.  IF OUTSIDE LIMITS CONTACT FOREMAN

C.  DEPT 16 SALT SPRAY                                     CODE: LE500R 08/01/17
    * SPECIFICATION CALLS FOR PARTS TO PASS 500 HOURS TO RED RUST
    * CUSTOMER HAS US HOLD THICKNESS DOWN FOR BETTER THREAD FIT
    * TEST ORDERS AS NEEDED TO VERIFY PROCESS
    * NORMAL SALT SPRAY RESULTS WILL RANGE FROM 300 - 600 HOURS TO RED RUST

D.  DEPT 16 FINAL INSPECT LINCOLN ELECTRIC TZ FOR SUPSOL    CODE: TZSOL 12/01/17
    APPEAR: 1. SEE APPEARANCE GUIDELINES ABOVE
    ADHES:  1. SEE ADHESION GUIDELINES ABOVE
    THICK:  1. MAKE SURE PARTS PASS ALL THICKNESS GUIDELINES LISTED ABOVE

    GAGE:   1. THREADED PARTS - GAGE 5 RANDOM PIECES W/APPROPRIATE EN PLATED
               STANDARD FASTENER.
               RECORD RESULTS:_________________________________________________
               NOTE:  PARTS IDENTIFIED AS TRILOBE OR SMS (SHEET METAL SCREW)
                      DO NOT NEED GAGED.
            2. ALL PARTS MUST ACCEPT GAGE FREELY.
process:
WE CERTIFY THAT THIS LOT OF PARTS
WAS PROCESSED TO THE FOLLOWING
PARAMETERS:
 
TIN-ZINC (.0002" - .0004")
& CLEAR TRIVALENT CHROMATE
E4265
 
QUALITY CONTROL DEPARTMENT
VARLAND METAL SERVICE, INC.
